EmailTemplate.name: SGN_Chivas_Brotocal.Invitation eDM 20160401.Email - Invite 2016401
EmailTemplate.subject: Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, It's Time for Another Party!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Gather your bros! The Chivas Brotocol is happening again at
Pump Room, on 8th April 2016 at 11pm - 2am.
Get ready for another awesome bros' night out. Check out what
went down at the last Chivas Brotocol party <[[https://www.facebook.com/media/set/?set=a.1349063615107208.1073741874.392545357425710&type=3]]> and remember to like
our Chivas Singapore Facebook <[[https://www.facebook.com/chivassingapore/?fref=ts]]> page.
See you there!
This is an automatically generated email, please do not reply.
